title: ‘Gotham’ Season 2 Casts Paul Reubens as Penguin’s Dad
text:
‘Gotham’ Season 2 Casts Paul Reubens as Penguin’s Dad 
Published By: Slashfilm.com - Today 
Paul Reubens is coming (back) to Gotham City. The Pee-wee Herman actor will appear in Season 2 of FOX’s Batman prequel Gotham as Pengu...
